EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #12.2019 Dealer Update #12
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - May 6, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | May 2019
ADS-B Out Upgrade Program​​
- This sales bulletin describes a promotional offering for equipment exchanges to minimize aircraft downtime. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-01 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-01%20Rev B_Primus II ADS-B Out Upgrade for Business Aircraft with RM-....pdf]]> for RM-855 equipped aircraft and 2019-02 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-02 Rev B_Primus II ADS-B Out Upgrade for Business Aircraft with RM-....pdf]]> for RM-850 equipped aircraft. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
DU-875 LCD Display Upgrades
- Maximize your customer’s options when deciding which DU-875 LCD display upgrade to choose when replacing or supporting DU-870 CRT displays on Primus 1000 / 2000 platforms. - This bulletin has updated STC tables, part number clarifications and updated software ordering instructions. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-12 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-12 DU-875 LCD Display Unit Upgrades for All Platforms REV A.pdf]]> - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
